error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'total_pencils' (18) was used instead of 'pencils_per_eraser' (6).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 7
Mary needs 6*1= <<6*1=6>>6 folders.
Mary needs 6*3= <<6*3=18>>18 pencils.
Mary needs 18/18= <<18/18=1>>1 erasers.
Mary spends 6*6= $<<6*6=36>>36 on folders.
Mary spends 18*2= $<<18*2=36>>36 on pencils.
Mary spends 1*1= $<<1*1=1>>1 on erasers.
Mary spends 36+36+1= $<<36+36+1=73>>73 on all the supplies except the paints.
Mary spends 80-73= $<<80-73=7>>7 on the paint set.
